plot: The modest one is pushed into a ditch by an Irish laborer and ruins his clothes. The Irishman loans him his best suit and Bragg tells the boys at the club a romantic story about the new suit, but the real owner spoils it all.
title: Bragg's New Suit
plot_es: The modest one is pushed into a ditch by an Irish laborer and ruins his clothes. The Irishman loans him his best suit and Bragg tells the boys at the club a romantic story about the new suit, but the real owner spoils it all.
plot_en: The modest one is pushed into a ditch by an Irish laborer and ruins his clothes. The Irishman loans him his best suit and Bragg tells the boys at the club a romantic story about the new suit, but the real owner spoils it all.

cast.role: Theodore Bragg - Teller of Tall Stories
cast.name: William Bechtel
